connection_to_monads.statement: A monad is an endofunctor M: C→C equipped with natural transformations η: Id→M (unit) and μ: M∘M→M (join)
connection_to_monads.why_endofunctor: We need M∘M (M applied twice) to make sense, requiring M: C→C
